00032 #pragma once
00033 #include "MathUtils.h"
00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include <cstdlib>
00036 #include <unordered_map>
00037 #include <limits>
00038 
00039 using namespace std;
00040 
00050 class Hue {
00051 
00052 public:
00053         static const Hue RED;
00054         static const Hue ORANGE;
00055         static const Hue YELLOW;
00056         static const Hue LIME;
00057         static const Hue GREEN;
00058         static const Hue TEAL;
00059         static const Hue CYAN;
00060         static const Hue AZURE;
00061         static const Hue BLUE;
00062         static const Hue INDIGO;
00063         static const Hue PURPLE;
00064         static const Hue PINK;
00065 
00069         static const float PRIMARY_VARIANCE;
00070 
00071         static vector<Hue> primaryColors;
00072         static tr1::unordered_map<const char*, Hue> namedColors;
00073 
00084         static Hue getClosest(float hue, bool primaryOnly) {
00085                 hue = fmod(hue, 1);
00086                 float dist = numeric_limits<float>::max();
00087                 Hue closest;
00088 
00089                 if (primaryOnly) {
00090                         for( vector<Hue>::iterator it = primaryColors.begin(); it != primaryColors.end(); ++it) {
00091                                 Hue h = *it;
00092                                 float d = MathUtils::min( abs(h.getHue() - hue), abs(1+h.getHue() - hue) );
00093                                 if (d < dist) {
00094                                         dist = d;
00095                                         closest = *it;
00096                                 }
00097                         }
00098                 } else {
00099                         for( tr1::unordered_map<const char*, Hue>::iterator it = namedColors.begin(); it != namedColors.end(); ++it) {
00100                                 Hue h = it->second;
00101                                 float d = MathUtils::min(  abs(h.getHue() - hue), abs(1+h.getHue() - hue)    );
00102                                 if (d < dist) {
00103                                         dist = d;
00104                                         closest = h;
00105                                 }
00106                         }
00107                 }
00108 
00109                 return closest;
00110         }
00111 
00118         static Hue getForName(const char* name) {
00119                 tr1::unordered_map<const char*, Hue>::iterator it = namedColors.find(name);
00120                 if (it != namedColors.end()) return it->second;
00121         }
00122 
00129         static bool isThisPrimary(float hue) {
00130                 return isThisPrimary(hue, PRIMARY_VARIANCE);
00131         }
00132 
00133         static bool isThisPrimary(float hue, float variance)
00134         {
00135                 bool isPrimary = false;
00136                 
00137                 for( vector<Hue>::iterator it = primaryColors.begin(); it != primaryColors.end(); ++it) {
00138                         if ( abs( (hue - it->getHue()) ) < variance ) {
00139                                 isPrimary = true;
00140                                 break;
00141                         }
00142                 }
00143                 return isPrimary;
00144         }
00145 
00146         Hue();
00147         Hue(const char* stringname, float hue);
00148         Hue(const char* stringname, float hue, bool isPrimary);
00149 
00150         const char* getName();
00151         float getHue();
00152         bool isHuePrimary();
00153 
00154 private:
00155         const char* name;
00156         float hue;
00157         bool isPrimary;
00158 };
